title: Seattle City Council Select Committee on Homelessness Strategies & Investments 4/8/20
description:
Agenda: Presentation on the City's efforts to provide additional hygiene facilities. Panel 1: Colleen Echohawk, Executive Director, Chief Seattle Club; Alison Eisinger, Executive Director, Seattle/King County Coalition on Homelessness; Dawn Whitson and Jessica Kwon, Evergreen Treatment Services - REACH; Brittany Meek, Downtown Emergency Service Center. Panel 2: Casey Sixkiller, Deputy Mayor; Patty Hayes, Director, and Ryan Kellogg, Seattle-King County Public Health Department.
